snippet: Investors can cut portfolio costs and increase returns if they are careful about where they put their money.
abstract: Investors can cut portfolio costs and increase returns if they are vigilant in their choices; lowest-cost, diversified passive portfolio has least all-in expenses; other tips on low-cost investing noted.
lead_paragraph: Investors can cut portfolio costs and increase returns if they are careful about where they put their money.

headline.main: The Erosive Effect of Expenses on a Portfolio’s Value
headline.print_headline: The Erosive Effect of Expenses on a Portfolio’s Value
